definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 32:16 male ass (young and vigorous);—pl. [[וַעְיׇרִם]] Ge 32:16 (E); sf. [[עִירׂה]] Ge 49:11 (poem; ‖[[בְּנִי אֲתׂנוֹ]]); cstr. [[עַיִר פֶּרֶא]] (Ges:§ 131 c N. 2; or appos. Kö:Synt. § 333 s Di al.) Job 11:12 wild ass's colt; pl. [[עֲיׇרִים]], for riding Ju Jdg 10:4 (v:Jdg 10:4 see II. [[עִיר]]), [[עֲיׇרִם]]), Jdg 12:14, sg. abs. [[עַיִר]] Zec 9:9; [[עֲיׇרִים]] for carrying Is 30:6 Qr (Kt [[עורים]]), [[עֲיׇרִם]] for tillage v:Is 30:24.
